channel.title: Queen Black Dragons fire wall
channel.description: Hello, I'm wondering if anyone can help me. When the queen attacks with the fire wall I want it to stay on the ground and be able to dodge it like real rs. But not fully sure on how it would be like. Any help or could you point in right direction?
